section.heading: Office of Veterans Affairs Fund.

para.text: There is established as a special fund the Office of Veterans Affairs Fund ("Fund"), which shall be administered by the Mayor in accordance with subsection (c) of this section.
Special purpose revenue received for the Office, including fees received by the Department of Motor Vehicles pursuant to §§ 50-1501.02a(b)(2) and 50-1501.02b(b)(1), shall be deposited in the Fund.
Money in the Fund shall be used for the purposes and functions described in this chapter.

Any money remaining available in the Fund at the end of a fiscal year, as determined by the Chief Financial Officer in the fiscal year-end close, shall be transferred to the unassigned fund balance of the General Fund of the District of Columbia as part of the fiscal year-end close.
